channel.title: Reading GlobalObjects from a .TXT file - ReP
channel.description:
Hi Mopars,
Here i am again :cool:
Next Question
I want to let my server read my addglobalobjects command from a .TXT file
any one have that code in there file or would be so nice to code it ? :P
Nice peopel will be rewarded :P
~ Supra

post in private i be back in 1 hour i think

item.title: Reading GlobalObjects from a .TXT file - ReP
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

You could make a handlerâ€¦
maybe try this

public class globalhandler { public globalhandler() { misc.println("Globalobjects loaded as handler"); } public class globalhandler{ public int id, x, y, type; public globalhandler(int id, int x, int y, int type){ this.id = id; this.x = x; this.y = y; this.type = type; } }

Uhmm try that
if it dont work try this and save as object.java

public class Object{ public int id, x, y, type; public Object(int id, int x, int y, int type){ this.id = id; this.x = x; this.y = y; this.type = type; } }

Read full topic
